:::tip

Display the permission points related to this functional module in tabular format.

You can visit the [Permission Explanation Example](https://product-doc-guide.alauda.cn/template/permissions/example.html) to view examples from the corresponding documentation.

:::

# Permissions

Remove the code block and replace the value of the `function` parameter with the name of the `FunctionResource` resource that needs to be displayed:
Use the following `<K8sPermissionTable \>` component to automatically generate the permission table. For detailed usage, refer to the [Guide to Automatically Generating Permission Tables](https://product-doc-guide.alauda.cn/guide/auto_gen_permissions.html).

```mdx
<K8sPermissionTable functions={['<functionName1>', '<functionName2>']} />
```
